graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonGetResources (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		code
		name
		isActive
		hasAttachments
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonFindResource (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		code
		name
		isActive
		hasAttachments
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	commonFindResourceById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		code
		name
		isActive
		hasAttachments
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($payload:CommonUpdateResourceInput!)
{
	commonUpdateResource (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		code
		name
		isActive
		hasAttachments
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	commonDeleteResourceById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		code
		name
		isActive
		hasAttachments
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonDeleteResources (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		code
		name
		isActive
		hasAttachments
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
